title: Praline Grahams
instructions: Arrange crackers side by side as close as you can on cookie sheet covered with foil.
Put butter and sugar in pan and cook 1 1/2 minutes.
When it comes to a boil, take off heat and add nuts and vanilla, then spread evenly over crackers. Bake 10 minutes at 350°.
When cool, break apart. Can be frozen.
